option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# TestNGLearning
Simple TestNG + Selenium learning project (Java, Maven) containing basic page objects, actions and a sample test.
## Overview This repository demonstrates a small test automation structure using: - Java - Maven - TestNG - Selenium WebDriver (page objects + actions)
## Prerequisites - JDK 8+ installed - Maven installed
## Build and run tests From the project root run:
mvn test
(Adjust browser drivers or WebDriver setup as needed in src/main/java/org/learning/managers/WebDriverManager.java)
## Project structure - src/main/java: page objects, actions and manager classes - src/test/java: TestNG tests
## TODO - [ ] Add CI workflow (GitHub Actions) to run tests on push - [ ] Parameterize browsers and environments - [ ] Add explicit logging and reporting (Allure / ExtentReports) - [ ] Improve README with examples and badges - [ ] Add more test coverage and negative test cases
--- Generated on: 2025-10-19
